name: Outlook Web App 2010 for Mobile
description: This style reorganizes the Outlook Web App for Exchange 2010 interface into a mobile friendly page. In addition, the styling is updated to look more like a modern application. This style should work on pages with a messenger.example.com or outlook.example.com URL. If this doesn't meet your organizations URL, please let me know. This style is still under development, please read the additional info before installing.
